reasoning: SIBO prevalence estimated 5-15% of general population based on breath test studies, using mid-range 8% (~8,000 per 100k). Incidence ~12 per 100k based on symptomatic presentation rates. Limited epidemiological data; estimates vary widely due to different diagnostic criteria and testing methods.
source: Ghoshal UC et al. (2017). Epidemiology of Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth in Asian Countries. Dig Dis. 35(4):313-318
